    level="1"
    right="Item 1+"
    pfs=""
>
[Star Grenade](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1604)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Outlaws of Alkenstar</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
<trait label="Bomb" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=21" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=36" />
<trait label="Fire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=72" />
<trait label="Splash" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=150" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #180: The Smoking Gun](/Sources.aspx?ID=125) pg. 75</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>Strike</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

These unusual gunpowder bombs, typically marked with a symbol of a four-pointed star on their outer surface, explode outward in the shape of a cross whenever they Strike a target. When you throw a star grenade, arrange two perpendicular 25-foot lines over the target, both centered on the target and moving straight through the target, not diagonally. Creatures other than the target within these two lines take [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) damage (typically 8 squares take splash damage for a Medium creature). Any effect that alters or adjusts the splash area's shape or size, like the alchemist feat [Expanded Splash](/Feats.aspx?ID=109), doesn't apply to star grenades.

</column>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

---

The bomb deals 1d8 fire damage and 1 splash damage.

>

</traits>

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

<traits>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

</column>

---

You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls. The bomb deals 4d8 fire damage and 4 splash damage.
